thread.title: Trump floats large fine for China's ZTE

title: Trump floats large fine for China's ZTE
text:
Trump floats large fine for China's ZTE 3:51pm EDT - 01:21
U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday floated a plan to fine ZTE Corp and shake up its management as his administration considered rolling back more severe penalties that have crippled the Chinese telecommunications company. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday floated a plan to fine ZTE Corp and shake up its management as his administration considered rolling back more severe penalties that have crippled the Chinese telecommunications company.
